channel.title: When i add npc this happens
channel.description:
ok when i add npc i compile and no erroes but when i log on everyone freezes at a black screen i get this...
[code]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 96 3234 3434 0 0 0 0 0 1 Fat Tony" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:934) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:26)[/code]
i get this when i compile, i log in just black screen
